title: [娱乐]MusicPlayer —— 为你的服务器添加音乐吧[1.7.9-1.8.1]
author: GTH2000
txt_content:
本帖最后由 1582952890 于 2017-9-17 08:35 编辑 
能做什么：
利用它你可以不用在客户端安装mod即可播放指定的音乐，让您的服务器更加独特
如何安装：
1.下载NoteBlockAPI：http://dev.bukkit.org/bukkit-plugins/noteblockapi/
2.安装NoteBlockAPI
3.下载MusicPlayer
4.安装
5.去这里下载.nbs格式的音乐并放到plugins/MusicPlayer/songs/
命令和权限：
Player Commands:/play <SongName/SongID>/stopsong/listsongs
Admin Commands:/musicplayer reloadsongs/musicplayer listsongs/musicplayer disablemusic/musicplayer enablemusic/musicplayer stopall/musicplayer playingsongs/musicplayer playall <SongName/SongID>
Permissionsmusic.reloadsongs: default: opmusic.listsongs: default: opmusic.disablemusic: default: opmusic.enablemusic: default: opmusic.stopall: default: opmusic.playall: default: opmusic.play: default: opmusic.listsongs: default: opmusic.adminhelp: default: opmusic.userhelp: default: opmusic.playingsongs: default: opmusic.playall: default: op
Contact
